posts.post_content:
There are a lot of ways to safely deal with Stuffy Doll in Standard: [Oblivion Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oblivion Ring), [Defang](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Defang), little auras like [Dead Weight](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dead Weight), [Tragic Slip](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tragic Slip), [Death Wind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Death Wind), and [Mutilate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mutilate), not to mention the millions of -1/-1 counters from Phyrexia. (And infect creatures will kill him, but Stuffy will still deal non-infect damage as he dies.) You can even use [Guise of Fire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Guise of Fire), but you probably don't want that in your deck.  
  
I haven't played with him before, but I guess he's a little less awesome than he used to be. Still awesome, though.
posts.html:
There are a lot of ways to safely deal with Stuffy Doll in Standard: Oblivion Ring, Defang, little auras like Dead Weight, Tragic Slip, Death Wind, and Mutilate, not to mention the millions of -1/-1 counters from Phyrexia. (And infect creatures will kill him, but Stuffy will still deal non-infect damage as he dies.) You can even use Guise of Fire, but you probably don't want that in your deck.

I haven't played with him before, but I guess he's a little less awesome than he used to be. Still awesome, though.

posts.post_content:
Lovely card ;-)  
I find that the new art is more suitable for M13 because the Time Spiral doll is a dependence on the very old dolls like The Rack, Black Vise or Cursed Rack and Time Spiral had many dependeces on older cards. Since M13 has so much connection to those old cards as Time Spiral, it would prabably (for me) weird to see the old picture in this reprint. As it is, a more sinister badass picture is more logical.

posts.post_content:
I threw together a deck around this guy like 5 minutes ago. I haven't played it yet but everyone tell me what you think:  
  
4x Stuffy doll  
4x Shivan meteor  
4x Pariah  
4x Obelisk of naya  
1x Garruk relentless  
4x Lightning bolt  
4x Dawn charm  
4x March of souls  
4x Wear away  
4x Aftershock  
4x Mwonvuli beast tracker  
1x Sunhome, fortress of the legion  
4x Kher keep  
5x Forest  
5x Plains  
4x Mountain  
  
If you're wondering why there's a Sunhome there, it's so that you can give your enemies double strike when they are blocked by stuffy.
